properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters of Northern Puerto Rico out 10 NM; Mona Passage Southward to 17N
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 29 at 11:02AM AST until March 3 at 2:00AM AST by NWS San Juan PR
properties.description:
...A northerly swell will invade the Atlantic waters late
Sunday...

.Winds and seas will increase with the arrival of a frontal boundary
and a northerly swell, that will sink southwards and spread across
the Atlantic waters and Mona Passage Sunday through Monday.

* WHAT...Choppy and increasing seas 5 to 7 feet expected. East to
northeast winds 10 to 20 kt with occasionally higher gusts.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters of Northern Puerto Rico out 10 NM and
Mona Passage Southward to 17N.

* WHEN...From 2 AM Monday to 2 AM AST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY WILL BE IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM MONDAY TO 2 AM AST TUESDAY
